Reviews.Title: Good quality, good price
Reviews.Author: Yachtman
Reviews.Content: Previous reviewer, where does Amazon say this is 3D?This is a good bargain, the picture is very good and the sound is adequate.  There are not many (if any) small sets with 120Hz refresh rate like this one.  I give it 4 stars because of those features.  This is not an internet TV and the user interface is basic.  For example, after running the channel scan (I connected this to cable provider without their box...), I would have liked to re-label the channels, but that is not supported.  You can add/remove channels and lock them out using a PIN.  As a 2nd or 3rd set in your house, this should do the trick.

Reviews.Title: It certainly gets the job done.
Reviews.Author: J. Hamman
Reviews.Content: It's a great TV for someone buying their first TV and have a strict budget (like me!). Based on my experience I have yet to have a problem with it.

Reviews.Title: Mixed thoughts/good & bad
Reviews.Author: Lorene Leon "roseglory"
Reviews.Content: I rated the Toshiba 1300 U a 3 with mixed feelings. The picture, sounds, ease of adjustments and extras are perfect.The disappointments are: not enough plug ins connections on the back for dvd, vhf, speakers, and other entertainment units.Also it does not  come with an users manual. I had to go online to read the manual and phone a rep to help me set it up,but for an extra TV it certainly is worth the low price.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: Martin H. Brasse
Reviews.Content: No problems setting it up. It was delivered on time, it was light and only took 15 minutes to get it up and running.

Reviews.Title: **please read before buying**
Reviews.Author: Nic
Reviews.Content: I gave this product one star because I wanted to make sure people would read this review.THERE IS NO EVIDENCE THAT THIS TV IS 120 HZ!!!!I called both Toshiba and Amazon to try and set up the tv to play at 120 hz, but neither companies were able to do so.  I troubleshot this for about 3 hours to no avail.Both companies were very responsive to my problem and amazon gave me a full refund.  Great customer support, though this is not a 120 hz television.  It is exactly what you would expect from a tv this price, poor quality.  Do not buy this to play video games, although for watching tv and movies, this television would be just fine.Beware and hope this helps.

Reviews.Title: Toshiba 32L1300U 32-Inch 720p 120Hz LED HDTV (Black
Reviews.Author: Bernie Seibert
Reviews.Content: It's got a good picture, I could have gotten one with a higher than 720p picture but it would have cost more money. I went for the 120 refresh rate because I like watching sports .For the money it's a good TV.

Reviews.Title: Toshiba 32" television review
Reviews.Author: Layla
Reviews.Content: For the price of this television, it's great product. I am very happy with this purchase. And my son loves the tv. It's on the wall mount I also bought from amazon prime for less the $26. Can you believe that? Picture quality if really good, clear and the color is very good. I would buy this product again and refer to friends and family members.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product
Reviews.Author: Bernard
Reviews.Content: Very good deal with unexpected benefits.  Picture quality is excellent despite low price. It is supposed to be a 720p HDTV, but somehow it can display images and text at 1920 x 1080 resolution (1080p)!

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: Brian "itsbri1"
Reviews.Content: Its a bit expensive considering its only 720P but being 120HZ was more important to me so I didnt get that ghost effect. Went with a name brand vs off brand,still debating if it was worth it

Reviews.Title: Toshiba 32" flatscreen tv
Reviews.Author: Barbara Russell
Reviews.Content: We upgraded from an old tv to a flatscreen for our vacation rental.  The old tv only received a handful of the available cable channels.  The new tv receives them all and more.  The picture is very clear, great color, and easy to use.  It is a great size for our condo.  We ordered a swivel stand but are not using it.  The tv is easy to move and it looks better without the stand.  Our son prefers Toshiba and we were not disappointed.  Great tv, very reasonably priced.  Impressive packing and quick shipping.

Reviews.Title: Toshiba 32" TV from Amazon
Reviews.Author: grannieannie "Grandmother Ann"
Reviews.Content: This TV was bought for my bedroom and it is perfect for that use.  It gets a very good picture and I consider it excellent for anyone who needs a relatively small TV.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Product
Reviews.Author: SIMON GONZALEZ
Reviews.Content: Very good TV, it looks great, very sharp images. The sound is crisp. Size is not your forte, but I love children and is also

Reviews.Title: Good size and the quality is great
Reviews.Author: saulsays
Reviews.Content: I didn't choose a higher rating because there are tvs out there that have a much more clear picture...I don't watch too much tv but I love watching soccer games and movies and the volume is pretty loud..i was surprised on how loud it was without a sound system.

Reviews.Title: Toshiba 32 inch HDTV
Reviews.Author: B. Corbitt "power shopper"
Reviews.Content: I already had one 32 inch Toshiba and was so happy with the quality of the picture I purchased one for another room.  Very easy to use, picture quality is great!

Reviews.Title: TV
Reviews.Author: Patti Frey
Reviews.Content: We bought 2 of these. Great product. Clear picture. USB port, and lots more features. Gifted one, kept the other.

Reviews.Title: Good for price
Reviews.Author: bryesha wilson
Reviews.Content: Great tv, only little issue is the screen gets glitchy at times when a lot of I guess the hertz has sumthin to do with it, sorry I don't really speak tv language lol

Reviews.Title: great tv youn can't lose
Reviews.Author: Jamane
Reviews.Content: everyting about this tv is good. the picture is great and i mostly love the pic size option for the screen size  adjustment.

Reviews.Title: Great tv so far!
Reviews.Author: John P.
Reviews.Content: Well, I gave this tv 4 stars. I'm rating the Toshiba product, not the seller I bought it from, or the carrier(fedex) they chose to get it to me with. Otherwise it'd be getting a rating of about 2 stars if that. Product got to my front door 2 weeks later than the last expected date of delivery window. Also, when I say got to my front door, that's where it was left out in open when I got home to it..So, with that being said it is a good tv. It was a little bit under my budget actually and I'm happy with my purchase so far.Bought this 32 inch for my bedroom. The main thing I was torn with while shopping around was do I get a 720p or 1080p resolution. More importantly while staying in my budget range, if I go 1080p like I want too, it's most likely going to be a generic brand or something I know little about. The main use I needed it for was to compliment my purchase of a ps4 so I needed a product that would be visually pleasing. So I did some research here and choose this because of the 120z refresh rate. Toshiba makes great tv's, period. I've known vizios to look and work beautifully right out the box and then to start having mechanical problems a couple years down the road. I put this tv up against a similar Philips 32 that's sold on here for a 50-70 bucks more.They look the same on paper, except this 120 refresh rate.Picture quality: 10Audio: 10 - no sound bar required for medium sized room, unless u need deep base and surround sound. (Which I'd then say why are you buying a 32inch lcd?)Easy to install. I started with the stand and then recently decided to wall mount it, looks great both ways! I love the way it looks mounted because the border around the actual screen is so thin. So it takes the bulky heavy look away from it unlike the Philip's I was comparing it to.Also love my tv to have a "sleep" function on the remote! Only con is that it's lacking ports. Only 2 hdmi and no computer monitor port.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy
Reviews.Author: Anthony Bryant
Reviews.Content: Pro: Low weight, thin profile, great picture, decent audio, good priceCon: Lacks audio out options#butts #employeediscount #silasbear #mossybank

Reviews.Title: Good equipment but no manual
Reviews.Author: ET on the Gulf
Reviews.Content: Toshiba has good equipment. I have owned Toshiba video equipment and laptops. It only had quick startup instructions but no users manual.

Reviews.Title: Quick delivery, but...
Reviews.Author: W.F. "Artist"
Reviews.Content: Came fast and as expected but the pack that was supposed to contain 6 screws was opened (and empty). I only received 2 screws both were scattered inside the box. Not a good look.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful picture !
Reviews.Author: Debbie Crowe "grannyofmany"
Reviews.Content: We love the TV, beautiful color and picture.  The only thing it took us awhile to figure out was getting it off gray scale mode. One would think it was part of the TV operation or options but we found it by accident on the remote. The directions never addressed this. Since we bought 2 TVs, we were stuck in this mode for a couple days until we figured it out.  The TV quality is great!

Reviews.Title: Extra TV
Reviews.Author: Lucille Janecek "Richard Janecek"
Reviews.Content: This TV was highly rated and a well deserved rating. It will be rarely used, but for the low price I paid I would recommend it. Delivered in good condition and when promised.

Reviews.Title: Good Buy
Reviews.Author: Judy Sarles
Reviews.Content: The base for the Toshiba TV is sturdy and was easy to attach.  I use an in-home antenna and the picture is perfect.  I don't have a problem with the sound, which is an oft-heard complaint about similar TVs.

Reviews.Title: Pleased
Reviews.Author: Elaine
Reviews.Content: I am pleased with my purchase which I chose for the price and make.  I've only be watching this TV for a little over a week and would  consider referring this product to others.

Reviews.Title: TV works great
Reviews.Author: DCS1023
Reviews.Content: We mounted it in our bedroom. The color and sound are great. Toshiba makes good products for a great price.

Reviews.Title: real nice gift
Reviews.Author: fun game
Reviews.Content: I bought it for my son for Christmas and he is still happy. It's a nice tv and a good gift

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: Rusty Mittendorf
Reviews.Content: The TV was a great buy with free shipping plus it was a good quality brand name as well. Tv picture was high quality as was the sound.

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: Anna C. Harris
Reviews.Content: Anniversary present for my husband.  He is very happy!!!!! Easy set up and beautiful picture.  Would recommend to anyone.  Thank You

Reviews.Title: As expected
Reviews.Author: Theodore Swanson
Reviews.Content: Everything did as promised so you can try it in confidence. Yes you really can so do it do it

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I am extremely happy with my purchase.  Picture quality is great.  My family doesn't have any complaints about this product.  It also arrived on it's delivery date :-)

Reviews.Title: Spend the extra $100 and get a better television.
Reviews.Author: LovetheGame
Reviews.Content: I thought that it would be worth trading the 1080 for the 720 since there is still a 120hz on this television which makes it a great price for the quality. I was wrong. First of all, there are not enough HDMI outlets and there are no s video hookups so I had to buy an external cable adaptor with the video cable hook ups so I could watch Netflix from my Wii. This is not a tv for someone with 'out dated' or older technology I guess, if you consider the Wii outdated. Also, I wanted a better quality television so I could watch dark movies and still see what was going on. This one didnt cut it. I tried to watch Thor but couldnt tell what was going on half the time :( Even after multiple picture settings and adjusting the brightness, I could not get a bright enough picture. I am not satisfied and will be returning it to Walmart and getting my $244 back and upgrading it to a television with 1080p and 120hz. It makes a huge difference to have the 1080 and this television just wasnt worth saving the money to settle on avergae quality viewing. I have a 46" samsung in the living room and the images jump out at you like you are in the darn movie. This television doesnt come close. Positives are that its farily cheap, a good brand, and its very light and easy to mount. Cons are no video hook ups for wii or older game systems, not enough color contrast in viewing, and there is also a delay when it turns on so you have to be patient.

Reviews.Title: Not equiped!!
Reviews.Author: Betty Flath
Reviews.Content: This tv has a nice picture but the sound is horrible. It doesnt have audio out ports so you cant use wireless devices or link any gaming systems.

Reviews.Title: great color, easy to operate, fabulous
Reviews.Author: Janet M. Moore "irish lady"
Reviews.Content: The picture is great, just the right size in a smallish living room; the delivery was fast, and well done by UPS. Thank you

Reviews.Title: All I expected
Reviews.Author: David E Rupert
Reviews.Content: Arrival was prompt. Instructions were clear. No missing items. Nice clear picture and better sound than I thought I would get. Absolutely a good TV for the price.

Reviews.Title: good purchase
Reviews.Author: abigail
Reviews.Content: Bought this at a great price for my 15 year old son for Christmas.  It has a very nice picture and was easy enough to set up.  one month later and no problems.  I went for the 120 hz because he mainly uses this for video games and they look great and there's no lag like you can get with a 60 hz.  I am happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy!
Reviews.Author: Nikki
Reviews.Content: TV came well before expected shipping date, with clear instructions and good packaging. Great sound, clear picture and was even able to call toshiba on their 800 # to help with questions. Nice size t.v., very pleased.

Reviews.Title: Great small tv
Reviews.Author: Eric
Reviews.Content: Great picture quality...you don't need anything more than 720p at 32" and this delivers.  Typical LCD slowish startup time, but its overall design is brilliant! Wish the volume could go lower...it's level 1 is what I keep it set to, but generally good sound.  Overall very satisfied with this tv.

Reviews.Title: geat TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Amanda "Amanda"
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for my husband after we moved and he wanted a larger one in the bedroom.  It is a great TV for the price, works well, the picture is nice.  But if you have an old DVD player you have to just by a cable to hook it up......didn't bother us since the picture quality is good.  it works well with our roku player.

Reviews.Title: Just ok
Reviews.Author: Michael Matthews
Reviews.Content: Everything about it is just ok. I expected better. Based on the description, I expected a latest technology TV, but it was a fat body old style TV.

Reviews.Title: Didn't even turn on!
Reviews.Author: Hasim Momin
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV on March 1, 2014. Seemed like a great TV according to other reviews. I gave it a try and was excited to start playing my ps3 games. But, as soon as I turned it on, it didn't even work. The power light came on bright and went dull in like 3 seconds. I called Toshiba tech support, and they explained that product had some kind of hardware issue. They also said that I should return it back to Amazon. And, that is exactly what I'm doing. In my opinion, stay away! I love Toshiba products, but this one's the lemon if you ask me.

Reviews.Title: Great buy!
Reviews.Author: clydeandbettylou
Reviews.Content: Very pleased with this purchase! Great quality features for the price! This iSync second purchase of a Toshiba flat screen.

Reviews.Title: So Far So Good!!
Reviews.Author: Daddy Sax
Reviews.Content: Can't speak for myself for this TV was bought as a gift to my Son who is off to College.  He said that he loved it and was very thankful for it.  The pics are great and it's working well with his HD cable box.

Reviews.Title: so far so good
Reviews.Author: Marcia
Reviews.Content: I have been using this television for about a month now with no problems.  Colour and clarity is good with volume that fills the room. I expected no less though. I have not yet explored any special features it may have, so a further update may be required.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Qualtiy and Very Good Value
Reviews.Author: Arthur G van Stolk
Reviews.Content: NIce sharp clear picture and a very easy to work remote control and hook up to the DVD player. Surprisingly good sound from the Flate screen itself.  Can be enhanced with a soundbar or home theater.

Reviews.Title: Refresh rate 120 hz??
Reviews.Author: TempeCowboy
Reviews.Content: The picture is good quality, the sound is good, the speakers are good.  It's pretty cheap.However, there is no option to adjust the refresh rate back and forth between 60hz and 120hz... In fact it doesn't even look like 120hz.... It looks like standard 60hz to me... And for this reason it loses two stars.If the reason you buy this tv is for 120hz ... I would stay away.

Reviews.Title: Love love love
Reviews.Author: arron gully
Reviews.Content: we love it and plan to get another the first of next month for the bedroom. Thank you so much for asking. We are truely enjoying it

Reviews.Title: Not quite what it claims to be.
Reviews.Author: Tom
Reviews.Content: This tv is supposed to be 120hz, as it offers no indication that it actually is apart from what is written on the box, I can only judge if this is true or not based on its performance, in which case it isn't.120hz would mean it is capable of displaying 120 frames in second, and this tv cannot properly handle 60fps based upon playing video games that run at 60fps. These games blur and look awful enough to make me not want to play them. Games that run at 30fps look fine. In most other aspects the tv functions well.

Reviews.Title: Not a 3D set
Reviews.Author: ChaPa
Reviews.Content: Amazon is calling this 3D, check the specs as it is not 3D. Even though 3D on a 720p LCD would probably look awful.

ProductInfo.Features:
ClearScan 120Hz refresh rate delivers clear fast-motion images.
Audyssey EQ and ABX audio technologies along with 14W speaker output create a rich, balanced soundscape
Inputs include 2 HDMI with CEC, 1 ColorStream component video and 1 shared composite.
ColorMaster technology allows 6-color hue, saturation and brightness control for custom visuals. DynaLight backlight control enables deep blacks and crisp detail, and dynamic picture mode ensures maximum contrast, clarity and color saturation.
USB port lets you access music and photos stored on USB devices.
ProductInfo.Name: Toshiba 32L1300U 32-Inch 720p 120Hz  LED HDTV (2013 Model)
